Player History
Drafted in 28th round, 438th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2018, off Robert Percival (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2018, off Roy Fisk (HOU)...

Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2018, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...

Drove in 7 runs against Seattle on 5/14/2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 8/25/2019...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $714,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Kansas City to Houston on 2/10/2022 (Going to KC: P Leo Cortez. Going to HOU: 2B Lucio Quijano, SS Philip Davies)...
Traded from Houston to Atlanta on 2/20/2022 (Going to HOU: RF Gregory Arrington. Going to ATL: SS Philip Davies, CF Mark Starr)...
